text: @CNN So , looks like Arizona Sheriff thought only 300 hundred people died with Coronavirus . And it's Ok ! if die more ! So , State expenses will be less . And - he cares reelect more than life & health . Now it's time for him to take quarantine time . Hope he recovers & run again . https://t.co/7CG0V4TQso
